value:
Proof that two Heroes bested a boss
during their journeys together. Serves
as a reminder of their time traveling.

A gift from Yuri. It is proof of
connection to the Ashen Wolves.

A gift from Yuri. Adorned with the
symbol of a wolf, it is proof of
affiliation with the Ashen Wolves.

A striking hairpin given by Constance.
Though simple, the fragrance of an
expensive perfume lingers on it.

A striking hairpin given by Constance.
Adorned with a cloud-calling talisman,
for those averse to sunlight.

key: MDAID_森の木の実が入った籠
MDAID_H_森の木の実が入った籠
value:
A basket from Hapi, loaded with fruits
and berries. Enjoy the flavors of the
forest wherever you are.

key: MDAID_森の木の実が入った籠・極
MDAID_H_森の木の実が入った籠・極
value:
A basket from Hapi, loaded with fruits
and berries. Even squirrels enjoy it!

A gift from Balthus, representing
the Ashen Wolves.

A gift from Balthus, frayed and dirty
in spots. It seems it is no stranger to
battle, having been through many.

Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Veronica
& Loki with Alfonse: Prince of Askr on your
team.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Veronica
& Loki on Lunatic or higher difficulty with
Sharena: Princess of Askr on your team.

Defeat Veronica: Brave Princess at level 40
or higher with Alfonse: Prince of Askr.

Defeat Loki: The Trickster at level 40
or higher with Sharena: Princess of Askr.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Veronica &
Loki on Lunatic or higher difficulty using an
all-cavalry team.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with a red ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a blue ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 4 on Lunatic
difficulty with a green ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.)

Clear Paralogue 46: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.)

Clear Paralogue 46: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 8: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with an infantry ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 8: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with an armored ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.)

Clear Paralogue 49: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with a cavalry ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.)

Clear Paralogue 49: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with a flying ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.)

Clear Book V, Chapter 11: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book V, Chapter 11: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book V, Chapter 11: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book V, Chapter 11: Part 4 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book V, Chapter 11: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Leader of the Ashen Wolf House. Behind the
tough talk lies a valiant defender of the weak.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Young lady of the fallen Imperial house
of Nuvelle. Has an overbearing attitude until
she's somewhere with sunlight. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Three Houses.

An apathetic young woman whose sighs have
the unique ability to draw monsters to her.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Former noble who ran away to Abyss due to
money problems. Revels in competition as
Leicester's King of Grappling. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Three Houses.

Cardinal of Garreg Mach Monastery who
oversees Abyss. Formed the Ashen Wolf
House. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

The god of Múspell, the Kingdom of Flame. His
raging personality burns white-hot with a drive
toward violence.

King of Niðavellir who rose from his station as
a lowly soldier. Remembers nothing of his past.

A combination dragon-cavalry unit!
Can grant bonus damage to allies'
attacks and obstruct enemy healing!

Uses his high mobility and ability to
swap positions with distant allies to
sow chaos and retreat to safety.

Her magic produces different effects
depending on the turn! She can also
effectively get Atk+17 and Spd+20.

Strong against dragons and beasts,
a sped-up Special, and Canto! Plus
she can get an effective Atk/Res+18.

Blocks foe follow-ups when initiating
combat and can also get a bonus of
Atk/Def+11 with the right conditions.

Follow-ups guaranteed when he's by
himself! Can easily escape from the
midst of the enemy ranks with Canto.

Can counter even ranged attacks and
can prevent foe follow-ups. On top of
that, speeds up Specials teamwide!

If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

$aEnables【Canto (２)】.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of turn, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.) At start of
combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd+6
to unit during combat.

Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Canto (２)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger after the granted action. Unit's base
movement has no effect on movement granted.
Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy)
a distance greater than ２ space(s).)

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

Grants Spd+3. If unit initiates combat or is
within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6
to unit during combat, neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks, neutralizes
foe's bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like
Fortify, Rally, etc.) on odd-numbered turns,
and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd
on even-numbered turns.

Effective against dragon and beast foes.
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of turn, if Special cooldown count is at
its maximum value, grants Special cooldown
count-1. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%,
grants Atk/Res+6 to unit during combat.

Grants Spd+3. If foe initiates combat or if
foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and neutralizes
effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks
and effects that prevent unit's follow-up
attacks during combat, and also, if unit is
not adjacent to an ally, inflicts Special
cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using
the lower of foe's Def or Res.
Unit and target ally swap spaces.

Grants HP+5, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. If unit is 5★,
level 40, a Legendary Hero or a Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 175, treats unit's
stats as 175 in modes like Arena. If unit is 5★,
level 40, not a Legendary Hero or Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 180, treats unit's
stats as 180 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat
total calculation excludes any values added by
merges and skills.)

If defending in Aether Raids, grants Def/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +11; 4 grants +7; ≤3 grants +3.
Destroyed defensive structures are
not counted.)

$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Res+3
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aAt start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Res+4
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aAt start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Res+5
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Res+7
to unit during combat. At start of combat, if
foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on
foe, grants an additional Atk/Res+2 to unit
during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aEnables【Canto (Rem.)】.

Inflicts Atk/Spd-1 on foe during combat.

【Canto (Rem.)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move spaces = any
movement not already used that turn.
(If unit used a movement skill that warped
them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger after the granted action. Unit's base
movement has no effect on movement granted.
Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy)
a distance greater than unit's remaining
movement.)

$aEnables【Canto (Rem.)】.

Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foe during combat.

After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move spaces = any
movement not already used that turn.
(If unit used a movement skill that warped
them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once

【Canto (Rem.)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move spaces = any
movement not already used that turn.
(If unit used a movement skill that warped
them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once

Grants Atk/Def+4 and the effect "if unit's
Atk > foe's Res during combat, unit's first
attack deals damage = 30% of unit's Atk
minus foe's Res" to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat,
and also, if unit's Atk > foe's Res during
combat, unit's first attack deals damage = 30%
of unit's Atk minus foe's Res.
